about.bio:
Hey there! I am a final year college student with a great desire to learn various development skills. I am enthusiastic in Web and Mobile App Technologies and currently working at Branch International as a Backend Engineering Intern. Besides coding, I can also do some graphic designing jobs - logos etc. My hobbies include playing video games and playing Guitar.
Feel free to contact me for anything :)
